scripts.build-python: cd webautomate_ai && poetry run pyinstaller --onefile --console --name WebAgent --distpath ../dist/python-executable --add-data 'modules:modules' --add-data 'utils:utils' --hidden-import browser_use --hidden-import playwright --hidden-import google.generativeai --hidden-import httpx --hidden-import dotenv agent.py
scripts.build-python-win: cd webautomate_ai && poetry run pyinstaller --onefile --console --name WebAgent.exe --distpath ../dist/python-executable --add-data 'modules:modules' --add-data 'utils:utils' --hidden-import browser_use --hidden-import playwright --hidden-import google.generativeai --hidden-import httpx --hidden-import dotenv agent.py
scripts.build-python-mac: cd webautomate_ai && poetry run pyinstaller --onefile --console --name WebAgent --distpath ../dist/python-executable --add-data 'modules:modules' --add-data 'utils:utils' --hidden-import browser_use --hidden-import playwright --hidden-import google.generativeai --hidden-import httpx --hidden-import dotenv agent.py
scripts.build-all: npm run build-python && npm run build-linux
scripts.build-all-windows: npm run build-python-win && npm run build-windows
scripts.build-all-mac: npm run build-python-mac && npm run build-mac
